com.amazon.carbonado.repo.dirmi

Interface RemoteProcedureExecutor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote

    public interface RemoteProcedureExecutor
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Remote interface for executing remote procedure calls. Defining this as a separate interface (instead of folding into RemoteRepository) allows the server implementation to cache session-specific serialization logic.
    Author:
    Brian S O'Neill
